thread.title: Hondo a Conn man
thread.title_full: Hondo a Conn man | New York Post

author: Hondo
title: Hondo a Conn man
text:
The Ravens staged a comeback for Hondo Thursday night, outlasting the Steelers in overtime to slash the dirty digits to 1,362 orlovskys.
Friday night: Mr. Aitch will accept Larry Linemaker’s generous offer of 18¹/₂ points and place a 20-unit investment on the University of Nutmeg to keep it semi-close against BYU.
Nominations for Cheaters of the Year are rolling in. So far, the leading candidates are: Larry Brown, for dragging SMU basketball into the NCAA cesspool; Volkswagen, for its scandalous emissions reports, the New York City public school system, for its grade-fixing; and the Patriots — nobody knows at this point what they have done but you can be sure something nefarious is going on in New England … From emailer BarkingMut of SoBe: Failed Nationals manager Matt Williams attributed the dugout fight between Jonathan Papelbon and Bryce Harper to “testosterone flowing.” Apparently, the Nats had plenty of it left over after wimping their way out of the NL East.
